articles.author: Jonathan Coles, William Walker
articles.title: Billionaire Tory donor's daughter-in-law charged after police chief shot dead - Mirror.co.uk
articles.description: Jasmine Hartin - the American partner of wealthy Tory donor Lord Ashcroft's son - was said to have been playing with an officer's gun when it went off and killed him
articles.content:
A British billionaire's daughter-in-law has been charged with manslaughter after a cop was shot dead, it has been reported.
The body of superintendent Henry Jemmott, 42, was found floating in the se… [+2452 chars]

articles.title: Shaken by COVID-19, some Americans try 'manifesting' a positive result - CNA

articles.title: Biden proclaims day of remembrance on 100th anniversary of Tulsa massacre - Axios
articles.description: He called on Americans to reflect on the "deep roots of racial terror" and "recommit to the work of rooting out systemic racism."
articles.content:
President Biden issued a proclamation to commemorate the 100th anniversary of the Tulsa Race Massacre and declared Monday to be a "Day of Remembrance."
